derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent.: from modern Latin conicus, from Greek kōnikos, from kōnos 'cone'

means.word_mean: 1. (geometry) a curve generated by the intersection of a plane and a circular cone
1. relating to or resembling a cone;
